feed.title: Category: Ikari Warriors | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Ikari Warriors (NES, 1986)
entry.content: I tried to play Ikari Warriors on my Famicom. I wanted to play it because I've heard it talked about some many times. But it was excruciatingly slow. I couldn't tell if it was the fault of my PowerPak or the normal behavior, but when I looked at videos online, it didn't seem like it was normally faster. It reminded me a little bit of Iron Tank, which I remember liking.
